CustomField.description: If the client mentions interest in, or you think they are a fit for, another product or service, use the lookup field to enter it here. This will trigger a notification to the product owner after your opportunity closes for them to reach out and start that sales process to keep you from stepping on each other's toes!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the client mentions interest in, or you think they are a fit for, another product or service, use the lookup field to enter it here. This will trigger a notification to the product owner after your opportunity closes for them to reach out and start that sales process to keep you from stepping on each other's toes!
CustomField.label: Cross-Sell Intel Product
